attributes.action: Speed camera on the Kingsdown estate
attributes.additional_details: We need to slow these drivers down before someone is seriously hurt or worse!
attributes.background:
Kingsdown in Bridgwater is a new estate that is also used as a bypass! 
Cars and lorries are constantly using it as a racing track!
There is a local school on this road and so many cars have lost control and mounted the kerbs where people walk.

rejection.details: Speed cameras in Bridgwater are the responsibility of the Avon and Somerset Constabulary. You could contact them with your request for a camera on the Kingsdown estate, at https://www.avonandsomerset.police.uk/contact-us/general-contact-enquiries/general-contact-and-enquiry-form/
